Maintenance_Steps.step_content: Please prepare the materials to be used: (Rubber Gloves,Scrub Brush,Damp Clean Soft Cloth, a Gallon of Hot Water)
Please wait as I drain any remaining water in the system.
Please remove the currentlyt installed water bottle
Please put hot water in the reservoir until half of the tank is filled.
The machine will be turned off for you to clean the reservoir manually. Pressing next will turn off the machine. Turn on the machine afterwards.
Please wait as I drain all the water remaining.
Please fill the reservoir with hot water again until half of the tank is filled.
Please clean the outside container with a soft damp cloth.
Please remove the drip tray and clean it.
Please attach all the uninstalled parts again.
Please install a new water bottle.
Please wait for an hour to enjoy hot and cold water. If you do not want to wait, you can press next and the machine will be operational again. (Water may not be cold and hot enough though)
